Articles.Content:
You can use the LK in BobCat's pack for that, you know?

I know but it's too big for my taste.
A bit of the progress)
Lovely. Are you gonna make a Rus-M rocket to go with it?

Lovely. Are you gonna make a Rus-M rocket to go with it?

Yes. I will. But now i have to continue creating solar panels, parachute and internal.

Huh... why Rus-M again, if I may ask? It got cancelled AFAIK, so something else will launch the PPTS. (tho I was too lazy to search for a definite answer onto WHAT will launch it... its just not Proton, thats for sure (and that makes me sad... who cares about poison when the rocket looks that awesome?))

Why does PTK capsule have docking windows on a side? On all PTK pictures docking windows are on top (or bottom?).

This can also be a problem when piloting from IVA, controls wouldn't act in the correct direction. Kerbals must be oriented so that their heads point to the south and legs to the north when a capsule is on a launch pad, just like in the Mk1-2 pod.

Huh... why Rus-M again, if I may ask? It got cancelled AFAIK, so something else will launch the PPTS. (tho I was too lazy to search for a definite answer onto WHAT will launch it... its just not Proton, thats for sure (and that makes me sad... who cares about poison when the rocket looks that awesome?))

From what I could find, the replacement for the Rus-M is the Amur (Angara 5P). Link

I thought it's this one here:

http://www.russianspaceweb.com/energia5k.html

Guys, can somebody help me please? I have a problem with raycastTransform for solar panels.

If you know what i do wrong please write here.
Luna-17 Released!
Graet job MrTheBull!!! would you update Vostok for 0.22?

Graet job MrTheBull!!! would you update Vostok for 0.22?

Vostok is compatible with 0.22...... I think
gj on luna 17, seriously, that was badly needed... the only important things left from that period are the venera type probes and the molniya stage now
yes... but is it available in career mode? probably not....

Yeah, it's not. Could you also upscale it a little? It doesn't fit the Soyuz very well right now. Also, could you make a Molniya Block L upper stage, Voskhod (should be easy, it's similar to Vostok) and an in-line fairing base for R-7 family? Sputnik would be another simple, yet interesting addition.
I think i will update the Vostok only when i release PPTS. Sorry for that. I have a lot of projects right now. What do you think about one big pack with my works? Like Soviet pack.

Yeah, it's not. Could you also upscale it a little? It doesn't fit the Soyuz very well right now. Also, could you make a Molniya Block L upper stage, Voskhod (should be easy, it's similar to Vostok) and an in-line fairing base for R-7 family? Sputnik would be another simple, yet interesting addition.

oh so its still left in 0.54-0.55 of its real scale? I didnt know that (as I wasnt playing KSP for ages...)

I think i have some progress with textures)

But it still not great. And i still have problems with solar panels.
Yes, one pack would be great!

I think i have some progress with textures)

But it still not great. And i still have problems with solar panels.

The textures look quite good. As for the solar panels you should consult the KSPModders IRC channel, they're a pretty knowledgeable bunch and they're active nearly 24/7.
Those new textures look extremely sexy!

The new pod, I'm not familiar with it - does anybody know why it has that weird "stepped" bit at the top, and offset RCS thrusters?

I take it this is some kind of next-generation crew transport vehicle?
Yes, it's called the PTK NP and will eventually replace the Soyuz.
Is there any special sciencey thing that the Luna-17 does? Or is that dependant on Bobcat

I think i have some progress with textures)

But it still not great. And i still have problems with solar panels.

Perhaps,this tutorial from Yogui87 will help you?.
